rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Integrated open-plan kitchen and living area featuring a spacious layout with ample natural light and ventilation. Walls are accented with Bohemian-inspired decor, including vibrant textiles and eclectic artwork. The design incorporates energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring a walk-in closet with ample storage space, natural lighting from strategically placed windows following Vastu principles. The interior design is vibrant and Bohemian with a mix of traditional Indian elements and modern amenities.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom designed for flexibility, ensuring privacy with an attached bathroom. Decorated in a Bohemian style featuring handcrafted decor and traditional Indian textiles.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: A dedicated study area that doubles as a workspace for professional or creative projects. The room is designed with ample lighting and ergonomic furniture following Vastu guidelines to boost productivity.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom located adjacent to the guest bedroom for ease of access. Features modern fixtures with sustainable water-saving devices and an open ventilation system in line with local norms.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Dedicated storage room integrated into the floor plan to keep clutter at bay. Designed with multi-functional shelves and hooks following Vastu guidelines for a harmonious balance.

openings.description: A welcoming main entrance adhering to local building norms. The entry is designed with ample lighting and an inviting facade that aligns with Vastu principles.
A semi-open porch area for relaxation before entering the home. The space is designed with natural elements and seating arrangements.
A balcony offering a panoramic view of the surroundings. Designed with privacy screens and an outdoor seating area.
Strategically placed window ensuring optimal natural lighting and ventilation for the master bedroom in accordance with Vastu principles.
